A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible! This is really the WORST star wars movie/television show ever made. I put this under the holiday special. The script is horrible! The logic is something a 4th grader would be ok with\, but no one else. Epic slow space chases? Luke comes back as a jerk? Luke never fights anyone? Rose is the new jar jar. Finn is wasted\, Poe is made out to be a moron. This is GARBAGE! For the 1st time\, I don't care about star wars anymore. Kathleen kennedy killed star wars for me.
